name: mikroe.click.dcmotor16
short_description: DC Motor 16 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a high-performance single phase reversible DC motor drive with speed control. This board features the ZXBM5210, a fully-featured DC motor drive solution with an average current capability of up to 700mA from Diodes Incorporated. The ZXBM5210 has several modes of operations selected by two GPIO pins, has a wide supply voltage range from 3V to 18V, and low power consumption.
